name: Obsidian
description: A sleek, modern dark theme inspired by premium developer tools. Features a rich charcoal background with vibrant purple/violet accents and carefully tuned contrast ratios for excellent readability.

fontFamily.sans: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif
fontFamily.mono: "JetBrains Mono", "Fira Code", Menlo, Monaco, "Courier New", monospace

button.name: Button
button.description: Interactive buttons with vibrant purple primary and clean variants. All buttons have smooth hover transitions and clear focus states.
button.usage:
## Button Usage

```tsx
// Primary - vibrant purple, use for main CTAs
<Button>Create Project</Button>

// Secondary - subtle dark background
<Button variant="secondary">Settings</Button>

// Outline - bordered, transparent background
<Button variant="outline">Cancel</Button>

// Ghost - minimal, no background
<Button variant="ghost">Learn More</Button>

// With icon
<Button>
  <Plus className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
  Add Item
</Button>

// Icon-only button
<Button variant="ghost" size="icon">
  <Settings className="h-4 w-4" />
</Button>
```

### Styling Classes
- Default: `bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 text-white`
- Secondary: `bg-secondary hover:bg-secondary/80 text-foreground`
- Outline: `border border-border hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground`
- Add `transition-all duration-200` for smooth interactions

do: Add icons to clarify button purpose
Use consistent sizing throughout the app
dont: Use multiple primary buttons in one section
Make buttons too wide - use max-width

card.name: Card
card.description: Content containers with subtle elevation. Cards use a slightly lighter background than the page with subtle borders.
card.usage:
## Card Usage

```tsx
// Standard card
<Card className="bg-card border border-border">
  <CardHeader>
    <CardTitle>Project Settings</CardTitle>
    <CardDescription className="text-muted-foreground">
      Configure your project preferences
    </CardDescription>
  </CardHeader>
  <CardContent className="space-y-4">
    {/* Content */}
  </CardContent>
  <CardFooter className="flex justify-end gap-2">
    <Button variant="outline">Cancel</Button>
    <Button>Save</Button>
  </CardFooter>
</Card>

// Interactive card with hover effect
<Card className="bg-card border border-border hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors cursor-pointer">
  {/* Content */}
</Card>

// Selected card
<Card className="bg-card border-2 border-primary ring-2 ring-primary/20">
  {/* Content */}
</Card>
```

### Key Patterns
- Use `p-4` or `p-6` for consistent padding
- Add `hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors` for interactive cards
- Use `space-y-4` or `space-y-6` for content spacing

do: Use cards to group related content
Add hover effects for clickable cards
dont: Forget border styling in dark mode

badge.name: Badge
badge.description: Status indicators with semantic colors. Use consistent color coding across the app.
badge.usage:
## Badge Usage

```tsx
// Status badges with semantic colors
<Badge className="bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-500/20">
  Completed
</Badge>

<Badge className="bg-blue-500/10 text-blue-400 border border-blue-500/20">
  In Progress
</Badge>

<Badge className="bg-amber-500/10 text-amber-400 border border-amber-500/20">
  Pending
</Badge>

<Badge className="bg-red-500/10 text-red-400 border border-red-500/20">
  Failed
</Badge>

// With animated dot
<Badge className="bg-blue-500/10 text-blue-400">
  <span className="h-1.5 w-1.5 rounded-full bg-blue-400 animate-pulse mr-2" />
  Running
</Badge>
```

### Status Color Map
```tsx
const STATUS_STYLES = {
  pending: 'bg-zinc-500/10 text-zinc-400 border-zinc-500/20',
  in_progress: 'bg-blue-500/10 text-blue-400 border-blue-500/20',
  completed: 'bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border-emerald-500/20',
  failed: 'bg-red-500/10 text-red-400 border-red-500/20',
  warning: 'bg-amber-500/10 text-amber-400 border-amber-500/20',
};
```

do: Use consistent colors for same status types

input.name: Input
input.description: Form inputs with dark backgrounds and purple focus rings. Always pair with labels.
input.usage:
## Input Usage ```tsx

We'll never share your email

// Error state

Password must be at least 8 characters

``` ### Styling Classes - Default: `bg-input border border-border rounded-md` - Focus: `focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20` - Error: `border-red-500 focus:ring-red-500/20`

dont: Use light backgrounds in dark theme

table.name: Table
table.description: Data tables with subtle row borders and hover states. Keep tables clean and scannable.
table.usage:
## Table Usage ```tsx
Name Status Actions Project Alpha Active
``` ### Key Patterns - Wrap in `border rounded-lg overflow-hidden` for clean edges - Use `bg-muted/50` for header - Add `hover:bg-muted/50 transition-colors` to rows

dialog.name: Dialog
dialog.description: Modal dialogs with dark overlay and card-like appearance.
dialog.usage:
## Dialog Usage ```tsx Edit Profile Make changes to your profile here.
{/* Form fields */}
``` ### Key Patterns - Use `bg-card border border-border` for dialog content - Add `sm:max-w-[size]` for width control - Footer buttons: outline for cancel, primary for confirm

tabs.name: Tabs
tabs.description: Navigation tabs with subtle active indicator. Use for switching between related views.
tabs.usage:
## Tabs Usage

```tsx
<Tabs defaultValue="overview" className="w-full">
  <TabsList className="bg-muted/50 border border-border">
    <TabsTrigger 
      value="overview"
      className="data-[state=active]:bg-background data-[state=active]:text-foreground"
    >
      Overview
    </TabsTrigger>
    <TabsTrigger value="settings">Settings</TabsTrigger>
    <TabsTrigger value="activity">Activity</TabsTrigger>
  </TabsList>
  <TabsContent value="overview" className="mt-4">
    {/* Overview content */}
  </TabsContent>
  <TabsContent value="settings" className="mt-4">
    {/* Settings content */}
  </TabsContent>
</Tabs>
```

### Key Patterns
- TabsList: `bg-muted/50 border border-border p-1 rounded-lg`
- Active trigger: `data-[state=active]:bg-background data-[state=active]:shadow-sm`

guidelines:
# Obsidian Design System Guidelines ## Philosophy Obsidian is designed for modern applications that prioritize content and functionality. The dark theme reduces eye strain, while vibrant purple accents create visual hierarchy and guide users to key actions. ## Color System ### Background Layers (darkest to lightest) 1. **Page Background** (`#0a0a0f`): The darkest layer, almost black with slight blue undertones 2. **Card Background** (`#12121a`): Slightly elevated surfaces 3. **Muted/Input** (`#1a1a24`): Form inputs, muted sections 4. **Secondary** (`#1e1e2a`): Secondary buttons, hover states 5. **Border** (`#27272a`): Subtle dividers and borders ### Accent Colors - **Primary Purple** (`#a855f7`): Main interactive color - buttons, links, focus rings - **Accent Violet** (`#7c3aed`): Secondary accent for variety - Use `hover:bg-primary/90` for hover states - Use `focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20` for focus rings ### Semantic Colors (10% opacity backgrounds) - **Success** (`#22c55e`): `bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400` - **Warning** (`#f59e0b`): `bg-amber-500/10 text-amber-400` - **Error** (`#ef4444`): `bg-red-500/10 text-red-400` - **Info** (`#3b82f6`): `bg-blue-500/10 text-blue-400` ## Typography ### Font Stack - **Sans**: Inter for clean, modern readability - **Mono**: JetBrains Mono for code and technical content ### Hierarchy - **Page Titles**: `text-3xl font-bold` or `text-4xl font-bold` - **Section Titles**: `text-xl font-semibold` or `text-2xl font-semibold` - **Card Titles**: `text-lg font-semibold` - **Body Text**: `text-sm` or `text-base` - **Labels**: `text-sm font-medium` - **Captions**: `text-xs text-muted-foreground` ## Spacing & Layout ### Container Patterns ```tsx // Page container
// Card grid
// Form sections
...
``` ### Common Spacing - **Tight**: `gap-2` (8px) - inline elements, badges - **Normal**: `gap-4` (16px) - form fields, card content - **Loose**: `gap-6` (24px) - sections, card grids - **Extra Loose**: `gap-8` (32px) - major page sections ## Interactive States ### Hover Effects ```tsx // Subtle background change className="hover:bg-muted/50 transition-colors" // Border highlight className="hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors" // Card lift effect className="hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all" ``` ### Focus States ```tsx // Input focus className="focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20" // Button focus className="focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:ring-offset-2 focus-visible:ring-offset-background" ``` ## Common Patterns ### Empty States ```tsx

No projects yet

Get started by creating your first project

``` ### Loading States ```tsx // Skeleton loading
// Spinner ``` ### Status Indicators ```tsx // Animated status dot ``` ## Accessibility - Maintain 4.5:1 contrast for text (WCAG AA) - All interactive elements must have visible focus states - Use semantic HTML elements - Include aria-labels for icon-only buttons ## Don't Do These 1. **Don't use pure white text** - Use `#fafafa` (foreground) for main text 2. **Don't use heavy shadows** - Dark themes need subtle shadows 3. **Don't forget borders** - Elements blend without subtle borders 4. **Don't use light backgrounds** - Everything should be dark 5. **Don't over-animate** - Keep transitions subtle and fast
